preference.name: TC_fts_aci_port
preference.preference_description: Specifies the Autonomy Content Infrastructure (ACI) action port number. This port is used to send action query commands to the Autonomy IDOL server. Valid Values: Accepts a single string as a value. Must be the number of the port used by the ACI. This preference setting should be the same as the Port setting in the Autonomy IDOL server's configuration file.
